verses.content: Mosie chun a dawn a, “Nisien- lakhawm, ngai ta, kei chu mi ring naw ni hai, ka râwl khawm ngai naw bawk an tih, ‘I kuomah LALPA ân lâr naw kha,’ an mi ti âwm sih a,” a tih a.
LALPA chun a kuomah, “Kha i kuta kha ieng am a na?” a tih a. Ama chun “Hmawl,” a tih a.
LALPA chun, “Hnuoi chungah pei thla rawh,” a tih a. Mosie chun hnuoia chun a pei thlâk a, rûlah a hung inchang tah a, Mosie chu a hmaa chun a tlânse tah a.
Chun, LALPA chun Mosie kuom- ah, “I kut khan ban la, a meiah man rawh,” (chun, a kutin a ban a, a chel tah a, a kuta chun hmawl a ni nâwk tah a,)
“LALPA, an thlatuhai Pathien, Abraham Pathien, Isak Pathien le Jakob Pathien i kuomah a hung inlâr ti an hriet theina dingin,” a tih a.
LALPA chun a kuomah, “I ângsûnga khan i kut sie rawh,” a ti nâwk a. Chun, a ângsûnga chun a kut chu a sie a; chun a lâk suok nâwk chun, ngai ta, a kut chu vûr anga vârin a lo inphâr tah a.
LALPA chun, “I kut kha i âng- sûngah sie nâwk rawh,” a tih a; chun, a kut chu a ângsûngah a sie nâwk a, ngai ta, a ângsûnga inthawka a lâk suok phing chun a taksa dang ang bawkin a um nâwk tah a.
LALPA chun, “Nang ring naw chein, inchikna pakhatna rawl khawm ngai naw hai sien khawm, inchikna nuhnung lem bêk chu ngai ngei an tih.

Chun hi inchiknahai pahni khawm hi an la ring nawh a, i rawl khawm an la ngai naw rawp chun, vadung tui lâng i ta, hnuoi hul chungah buok i tih; chun, vadunga inthawka tui i lâk chu hnuoi hul chunga chun thisen hung nîng a tih,” a tih a.
Mosie chun LALPA kuomah, “Tuhin le a hma khawmin, i siehlaw kuomah thu i hung hril chena khawm, mi danginnâl ka ni nawh a, ṭawng muongtak le leili zawi ka ni sih a,” a tih a.
LALPA chun a kuomah, “Mihriem bau chu tuin am a siem a? Tuin am mi chu ṭawngtheilo, nasêt, mitvar le mitdelin a siem? Kei, LALPA hin ni lo am a nih?
Chuongchun, tuhin fe la, kei i bauah um ka ta, i thuhril ding chu inchûktir ka ti che,” a tih a.
Ama ruok chun, “Aw LALPA, ka hni che, mi dang tir lem el rawh,” a tih a.

Mosie chunga chun LALPA lunginsenna chu a hung zuol tah a, “Levi mi, i unaupa Aron kha a um naw am a nih? Thu hriltheitak a nih ti ka hriet. Ngai rawh, nangma tuok dingin a hung suok mêk a; a hmu pha che chun a lungrilah lâwm a tih.
Ama kuoma chun thu hril i ta, thuhai chu ama bauah sieng i ta: i bau le ama baua chun um ka ta, ieng am in thaw ding chu inchûktir ka ti cheu.
Ama chu i ta dingin mipuihai kuoma thuhriltu nîng a tih; ama chu i ta dingin bau nîng a ta, nang chu a ta dingin Pathien ang nîng i tih.
Hi hmawl hi i kutin chawi pei i ta, chu chun inchiknahai chu thâwng i tih,” a tih a.

Mosie chu a tarpupa Jethro kuomah a kîr nâwk tah a, a kuomah, “Ka hni che hi, mîn fetir la, ka unauhai Aiguptaa umhai kuoma chun mîn kîrtir nâwk la, damin am an um va hmûng ka tih,” a tih a. Jethro chun Mosie kuomah, “Thla- muongtakin fe rawh,” a tih a.
LALPA chun Midian rama Mosie kuomah, “Fe la, Aiguptaah kîr nâwk rawh; nangma sukhlum tum- tuhai po kha an thi ta sih a,” a tih a.
Mosie chun a naupasalhai le a nuhmei a ṭhuoi a, sabengtung chung- ah anni ân chuongtir a, Aigupta ramah a kîr nâwk tah a. Mosie chun Pathien hmawl chu a kutin a chawi pei a.

LALPA chun Mosie kuomah, “Aiguptaa i kîr nâwk pha, i kuta thilmak ka sie po pohai kha Pharao hmaah thaw ngei i ta; nisien- lakhawm, mihai chu ân fetir nawna dingin a lungril chu ka sukngar ding a nih.
Chun, nangin Pharao kuoma chun, ‘Hieng hin LALPA chun a tih; Israel hi ka naupa, ka nau lutîr a nih;

chuleiin, i kuomah, “Ka naupa hi ka rawng a bâwl theina dingin infetir rawh,” ka ti a nih; infetir chu i phal naw chun, ngai rawh, i naupa i nau lutîr ngei chu sukhlum ka tih, ti ka hril che hi a tih,’ tiin i hril ding a nih,” a tih a.
Lam kâra an riekna hmuna chun LALPA chun ân tuokpui a, ama chu that a tum tah a.
Zippora chun meitâwklung ngei a lâk a, a naupa serhmawr vun chu a ât thlâk a, Mosie ke chu ân tâwktir a; chun, chu nu chun, “Ka ta dingin moneitu, thisen insuohmang, i ni ngei el hi,” a tih a.
Chuongchun, LALPAIN Mosie chu ân thla tah a. Chutikle chun a nih chu nu chun “Sertanna lei hin thisen insuohmang moneitu i nih,” a ti chu.
LALPA chun Aron kuomah, “Thlalêrah Mosie tuok dingin fe rawh,” a tih a. Chuongchun, a feh a, Pathien tlânga chun a vân tuokpui a, ama chu a fâwp tah a.
Mosie chun LALPAIN ama a tirna thuhai po po, le inchikna ama ân kawltirhai po po chu, Aron kuom- ah a hril tah a.
Chun, Mosie le Aron chu an fe tah a, Israel thla upahai po po chu an ko khâwm a.
Aron chun LALPAIN Mosie kuoma thu a hril po pohai chu a hril a, mipuihai hmaa chun inchiknahai chu a thaw tah a.
Mipui chun an ring tah a: LALPA chun Israel thlahai chu a hung sir tah a, an rimsik tuorna chu a hmu tah ti an hriet chun, an luhai an kûn a, chibai an bûk tah a.
